description: Tree work the subject of TPO LBI Junction Road (No.3): 1979 Felling of T9 Ash.Works: Fell to ground level and grub out roots.Pruning of Six trees. Works:  T8 Sycamore:- Lift crown by up to 12'. Deadwood and  thin by 25%.  T10 Plane:- crown lift by up to 18'. Remove deadwood.  Cut back up to 4 branches to correct lean. Reshape and  balance crown.  T11 Lime:- Cut back damaged limb. Crown lift by 12'-18'  Thin by 25%. Reshape and balance crown.  T12 Lime:- Feather trunk. Crown lift up to 12'. Reduce  height and spread by one quarter. Balance crown.  T18 & 19 Horse Chestnuts:- Crown lift by up to 15'.  thin crown by 30%. Balance crown.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
